span.t-attf-style: background-color: #{submenu.menu_label_id.background_color}; color: #{submenu.menu_label_id.color}; top:#{'-100%' if submenu.menu_label_id.label_position == 'label_top' else '100%'} ;

div.t-attf-style: border-color: #{submenu.menu_label_id.background_color}; #{'bottom : -4px ' if submenu.menu_label_id.label_position == 'label_top' else 'top : -4px'}; transform: #{'translateX(-50%) rotate(0deg)' if submenu.menu_label_id.label_position == 'label_top' else 'translateX(-50%) rotate(180deg)'};
